question.text: Tanner Publications is currently seeking a copy editor with previous experience ___ excellent communication skills.

answer.explanation: We connect the two noun phrases using "and".

question.text: Mi-Sun Park’s artwork ___ combines classical elements with modern materials and techniques.

answer.explanation: We are giving more information on the verb "combines" so we use an adverb.

question.text: Due to the ongoing renovations in the lobby, please do not enter the building through the north entrance until you are ___ otherwise.
In recognition of Elaine Tang’s exceptional service to ___ company, the human resources director will honor her at tonight’s employee awards ceremony.

answer.explanation: The answer comes before a noun so we use "our".

question.text: Ms. Reston and Mr. Parnthong were two of the senior partners ___ visited the clients last week.

answer.explanation: This is a relative clause with human subject so we use "who".

question.text: Randy Waters will be doing a product demonstration ___ the electronics convention in Atlanta.
Silveira & Ogawa Corporation’s successful new line of cookware has helped to boost the company's ___ performance this quarter.

answer.explanation: Financial performance = Activities related to money

question.text: The clothing shop is ___ because it sells quality uniforms at competitive prices.

answer.explanation: The answer comes after "is" so we use an adjective. "Success" needs to go with "a" to be the answer.

question.text: Before ___ the envelope, please be sure you have enclosed all of the documents listed in your orientation packet.
Tomorrow we will meet with a ___ of consultants who specialize in staff training and team building.

answer.explanation: "Supply", "measure", and "fraction" are not used for humans so we choose "group".
